name: Deep Dive (SkywardSC2, LoFons, davicrc)
description:
Dive deeper into the ocean by solving increasingly challenging math puzzles!

In this game, you have to sort all your numbered balls between the "Dive Hatch" and the "Rise Hatch" to get to the next depth level, until you hit the bottom of the ocean!

This game was made as an entry for the 1 week long Blackthornprod Game Jam #3 whose theme was "Less is More", and in this game Less alttitude value = More depth!

How to play:
  1. Slide the numbered balls into one of the hatches to increase or decrease your Current Depth (You have to use all the balls to complete the stage).
  2. Try to match your Current Depth with the Target Depth.
  3. Click the Undo Button to recover the last ball used and the last Current Depth value.
  4. Dive as deep as you can!
Credits
  • Rodrigo Mendes Andrade (skywardsc2)
  • Davi Cohen Ramos Costa (davicrc)
  • Lara de Oliveira Fonseca (LoFons)
